languages.text: С великой осторожностью бесчувственное тело Ульфара Громогласного доставили к шаттлам и, не теряя времени, возвратили на корабль для оказания срочной помощи. Вопреки заверению лекаря, Космический волк не испустил дух и сумел выкарабкаться из разверзшейся пасти Моркаи.

With great care, the insensate body of Ulfar Thunderlung is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment. Despite the healer's prognosis, the Space Wolf's spirit clings on and he drags himself out of Morkai's jaws.
languages.original_text: С великой осторожностью бесчувственное тело Ульфара Громогласного доставили к шаттлам и, не теряя времени, возвратили на корабль для оказания срочной помощи. Вопреки заверению лекаря, Космический волк не испустил дух и сумел выкарабкаться из разверзшейся пасти Моркаи.

traits.locale_text: With great care, the insensate body of Ulfar Thunderlung is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment. Despite the healer's prognosis, the Space Wolf's spirit clings on and he drags himself out of Morkai's jaws.

With great care, the insensate body of Ulfar Thunderlung is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment. Despite the healer's prognosis, the Space Wolf's spirit clings on and he drags himself out of Morkai's jaws.

With great care, the insensate body of Ulfar Thunderlung is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment. Despite the healer's prognosis, the Space Wolf's spirit clings on and he drags himself out of Morkai's jaws.

With great care, the insensate body of Ulfar Thunderlung is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment. Despite the healer's prognosis, the Space Wolf's spirit clings on and he drags himself out of Morkai's jaws.

languages.text: 士兵们把不省人事的乌尔法·雷狼小心翼翼地抬上了穿梭机，片刻不停地带回了飞船，进行紧急治疗。尽管治疗师并不抱太大希望，但这位太空野狼还是顽强地支撑到了最后，成功地从莫凯的死亡巨口中逃了出来。
languages.original_text: With great care, the insensate body of Ulfar Thunderlung is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment. Despite the healer's prognosis, the Space Wolf's spirit clings on and he drags himself out of Morkai's jaws.

traits.locale_text: 士兵们把不省人事的乌尔法·雷狼小心翼翼地抬上了穿梭机，片刻不停地带回了飞船，进行紧急治疗。尽管治疗师并不抱太大希望，但这位太空野狼还是顽强地支撑到了最后，成功地从莫凯的死亡巨口中逃了出来。

languages.text: 細心の注意を払いながら、感覚のないウルファー・サンダーラングの身体をシャトルへと運び、応急処置のため即座にシップへと帰還する。治療師による処置が行われたが、スペースウルフの魂はモルカイのあごと強く結びついており、やっとの思いでウルファーは抜け出す。
languages.original_text: With great care, the insensate body of Ulfar Thunderlung is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment. Despite the healer's prognosis, the Space Wolf's spirit clings on and he drags himself out of Morkai's jaws.

traits.locale_text: 細心の注意を払いながら、感覚のないウルファー・サンダーラングの身体をシャトルへと運び、応急処置のため即座にシップへと帰還する。治療師による処置が行われたが、スペースウルフの魂はモルカイのあごと強く結びついており、やっとの思いでウルファーは抜け出す。

languages.text: Con sumo cuidado, el cuerpo demacrado de Ulfar Pulmón Atronador es llevado a las lanzaderas y, sin perder el tiempo, devuelto a la nave para recibir cuidados intensivos. Pese al pronóstico del médico, el espíritu del Lobo Espacial se aferra a la vida y se arrastra fuera de las fauces de Morkai.
languages.original_text: With great care, the insensate body of Ulfar Thunderlung is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment. Despite the healer's prognosis, the Space Wolf's spirit clings on and he drags himself out of Morkai's jaws.

traits.locale_text: Con sumo cuidado, el cuerpo demacrado de Ulfar Pulmón Atronador es llevado a las lanzaderas y, sin perder el tiempo, devuelto a la nave para recibir cuidados intensivos. Pese al pronóstico del médico, el espíritu del Lobo Espacial se aferra a la vida y se arrastra fuera de las fauces de Morkai.

languages.text: Le corps inconscient d'Ulfar est transporté jusqu'à la navette avec précaution puis ramené à bord du vaisseau pour recevoir des soins urgents. Malgré le diagnostic du guérisseur, l'esprit du Space Wolf s'accroche et parvient à s'extirper des mâchoires de Morkaï.
languages.original_text: With great care, the insensate body of Ulfar Thunderlung is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment. Despite the healer's prognosis, the Space Wolf's spirit clings on and he drags himself out of Morkai's jaws.

traits.locale_text: Le corps inconscient d'Ulfar est transporté jusqu'à la navette avec précaution puis ramené à bord du vaisseau pour recevoir des soins urgents. Malgré le diagnostic du guérisseur, l'esprit du Space Wolf s'accroche et parvient à s'extirper des mâchoires de Morkaï.

languages.text: Mit großer Vorsicht wird der leblose Körper von Ulfar Donnerlunge zu den Shuttles transportiert und ohne Zeitverschwendung zur Notfallversorgung aufs Schiff zurückgebracht. Trotz der Prognose des Heilers klammert sich der Geist des Space Wolf ans Leben und befreit sich noch einmal aus Morkais Schlund.
languages.original_text: With great care, the insensate body of Ulfar Thunderlung is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment. Despite the healer's prognosis, the Space Wolf's spirit clings on and he drags himself out of Morkai's jaws.

traits.locale_text: Mit großer Vorsicht wird der leblose Körper von Ulfar Donnerlunge zu den Shuttles transportiert und ohne Zeitverschwendung zur Notfallversorgung aufs Schiff zurückgebracht. Trotz der Prognose des Heilers klammert sich der Geist des Space Wolf ans Leben und befreit sich noch einmal aus Morkais Schlund.

languages.text: Bilinci kapalı Ulfar Tufanciğer'in bedeni, dikkatle mekiğe taşındı ve hiç zaman kaybetmeden acil tedavi alabilmesi için gemiye götürüldü. Şifacı'nın teşhisine rağmen Uzay Kurdu'nın ruhu dayandı ve kendini Morkai'ın dişlerinden kurtardı.
languages.original_text: With great care, the insensate body of Ulfar Thunderlung is borne to the shuttles and, wasting no time, brought back to the ship for urgent treatment. Despite the healer's prognosis, the Space Wolf's spirit clings on and he drags himself out of Morkai's jaws.

traits.locale_text: Bilinci kapalı Ulfar Tufanciğer'in bedeni, dikkatle mekiğe taşındı ve hiç zaman kaybetmeden acil tedavi alabilmesi için gemiye götürüldü. Şifacı'nın teşhisine rağmen Uzay Kurdu'nın ruhu dayandı ve kendini Morkai'ın dişlerinden kurtardı.
